meanings.definition: A game played with small six-pointed metal or plastic pieces.
meanings.sent1: We played jackstones in the park yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The children gathered around to play jackstones during recess.
meanings.sent3: Sarah giggled as she accidentally dropped the jackstones all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: The clinking sound of the jackstones hitting the ground echoed through the room.
meanings.sent5: The shiny jackstones glinted in the sunlight, inviting us to play.

meanings.definition: A small six-pointed metal or plastic piece used in the game of jackstones.
meanings.sent1: I found a colorful jackstone hidden under the couch.
meanings.sent2: The kids argued over who would get to use the last jackstone for the game.
meanings.sent3: Tommy pretended the jackstone was a magical gem from a faraway land.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with excitement as she held the precious jackstone in her hand.
meanings.sent5: The tiny jackstone felt cool and smooth against my fingertips.
